Articles.Content:
Hi everybody!

One Really Great Thing would be to have the ability to sort and organize parts. Right now 'Propulsion' has like 8 pages of things in it.

If we were able to have '3M Tanks', '1.5M Couplers', 'Nose Cones', etc. it would make spacecraft construction much easier...
and where, do you propose, the extra 20 plus pages of single items should go?

The current system was designed as only a place holder as Harv never expected so many community made parts so early in the project. There are plans to revisit and redesign the whole VAB/SPH parts UI in the future, it just isn\'t that high of a priority at the moment.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
This was actually planned as a bonus feature for this update, but it\'s being delayed to when Unity 4 is released as it\'ll have many new GUI gizmos.
